TopicTitle: Problem with the ASAS (now IAS) module not using RCS Ports

Articles.Content:
So as many of you know the .21 KSP update is out and I have found that the ASAS module will not keep my ship stable and completely ignores all of the RCS ports. When I have SAS and RCS on it is as if I don't have either of them on. Is anyone else having trouble with RCS?

Thanks
